H0.text: when do you pray the chaplet of divine mercy. Easter Sunday

H1.text: when do you pray the chaplet of divine mercy. Ash Wednesday

H2.text: when do you pray the chaplet of divine mercy. The Feast of the Sacred Heart

H3.text: when do you pray the chaplet of divine mercy. Good Friday

A4.text: In a novena, the chaplet is usually said each of the nine days from Good Friday to Divine Mercy Sunday.

A5.text: In 2000, Pope John Paul II ordained the Sunday after Easter as the Divine Mercy Sunday.
